exhibits.name: LOOTING DREAM
exhibits.description: LOOTING DREAM is an interactive web fantasy about distorting, glitching, re-inserting, and deleting from glass boxes + institutions.

exhibits.name: Deleted in 2020
exhibits.description: 'Deleted in 2020' is a collection of images submitted by Instagram users. All the images in this exhibit were deleted off Instagram due to violations of community guidelines.
